Package controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EndTurnController
    This controller will manage the end turn action
    GUIDataController
    The gui data controller that will fetch data from the game, for creating the GUI visuals.
    MoveController
    This class will handle the move actions of the GUI.
    NewGameController
    A controller for the GUI to create new games.
    PickUpItemController
    A controller that will handle the GUI pick up commands.
    UseItemController
    A controller for handling the use item actions of the GUI.
